languages.text: {n}Острые чешуйки откалываются от плотной кожи с каждым выстрелом — и плоть существа разрывается, превращая гадкую тушу в кровавое месиво. Изуродованное лицо, полностью лишившееся кожи и костей, скалится безумной улыбкой оторванной челюсти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Острые чешуйки откалываются от плотной кожи с каждым выстрелом — и плоть существа разрывается, превращяя гадкую тушу в кровавое месиво. Изуродованное лицо, полностью лишившееся кожи и костей, скалится безумной улыбкой оторванной челюсти.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Острые чешуйки откалываются от плотной кожи с каждым выстрелом — и плоть существа разрывается, превращая гадкую тушу в кровавое месиво. Изуродованное лицо, полностью лишившееся кожи и костей, скалится безумной улыбкой оторванной челюсти.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot, and the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody mess. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

traits.locale_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}鋭利な鱗は、撃たれるたびに密集した皮膚から剥がれ落ちる。醜い死骸を血まみれの肉片へと変える無数の弾丸によって、生物の肉体は引き裂かれた。皮膚も骨さえも完全に剥ぎ取られて切り刻まれた顔は、顎を切断されたかのように不気味な笑みを浮かべている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鋭利な鱗は、撃たれるたびに密集した皮膚から剥がれ落ちる。醜い死骸を血まみれの肉片へと変える無数の弾丸によって、生物の肉体は引き裂かれた。皮膚も骨さえも完全に剥ぎ取られて切り刻まれた顔は、顎を切断されたかのように不気味な笑みを浮かべている。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Unas escamas afiladas se separan de la gruesa piel cada vez que tus disparos hacen estallar la carne de la criatura, reduciendo su cuerpo a una masa sanguinolenta. El rostro mutilado, completamente desollado e incluso deshuesado, te mira con la demente sonrisa de una mandíbula desencajada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas escamas afiladas se separan de la gruesa piel cada vez que tus disparos hacen estallar la carne de la criatura, reduciendo su cuerpo a una masa sanguinolenta. El rostro mutilado, completamente desollado e incluso deshuesado, te mira con la demente sonrisa de una mandíbula desencajada.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}伴随着她的每一次射击，怪物身上的鳞甲片片剥落。在飞溅的血花中，无数流弹将这堆丑陋的烂肉化成了一滩肉酱。那张千疮百孔的怪脸被扯掉了皮肤，打碎了骨头，只剩下半截下巴，对你露出了狂乱的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伴随着她的每一次射击，怪物身上的鳞甲片片剥落。在飞溅的血花中，无数流弹将这堆丑陋的烂肉化成了一滩肉酱。那张千疮百孔的怪脸被扯掉了皮肤，打碎了骨头，只剩下半截下巴，对你露出了狂乱的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Les écailles acérées se brisent sous l'impact des projectiles, dévoilant une peau épaisse qui est rapidement réduite à une montagne de bouillie sanguinolente. Son visage est écorché, sa mâchoire brisée et ses os réduits en poussière, mais il continue d'afficher un sourire dément.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les écailles acérées se brisent sous l'impact des projectiles, dévoilant une peau épaisse qui est rapidement réduite à une montagne de bouillie sanguinolente. Son visage est écorché, sa mâchoire brisée et ses os réduits en poussière, mais il continue d'afficher un sourire dément.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Scharfe Schuppen brechen mit jedem Schuss von der dichten Haut ab. Das Fleisch der Kreatur explodiert, ihr widerwärtiger Kadaver verwandelt sich in blutigen Brei. Das verstümmelte Gesicht, ohne jede Haut und selbst ohne Knochen, grinst dich mit dem wahnsinnigen Lächeln eines abgetrennten Kiefers an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Scharfe Schuppen brechen mit jedem Schuss von der dichten Haut ab. Das Fleisch der Kreatur explodiert, ihr widerwärtiger Kadaver verwandelt sich in blutigen Brei. Das verstümmelte Gesicht, ohne jede Haut und selbst ohne Knochen, grinst dich mit dem wahnsinnigen Lächeln eines abgetrennten Kiefers an.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaloDevice_Noble

languages.text: {n}Her kurşunla yaratığın sert derisinden keskin pullar dökülüyor. Çirkin cesedi patlayıp pestile dönüyor. Yüzünün derisi ve hatta kemikleri tamamen soyulup paramparça kalmış, kopmuş çenesi ise delirmişçesine sırıtıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sharp scales break away from the dense skin with every shot as the creature's flesh explodes, reducing its ugly carcass to a bloody pulp. The mutilated face, completely stripped of skin, and even bones, grins at you with the demented smile of a severed jaw.{/n}
